meanings.definition: Extremely glamorous or stylish in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The movie star looked ultraglamorous on the red carpet.
meanings.sent2: She wore an ultraglamorous dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The ultraglamorous cat strutted down the street like a fashion model.
meanings.sent4: The ultraglamorous sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: Her ultraglamorous smile lit up the room.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an extravagant or luxurious style.
meanings.sent1: The ultraglamorous mansion had a grand staircase.
meanings.sent2: The hotel suite was decorated in an ultraglamorous manner.
meanings.sent3: The ultraglamorous party had golden decorations everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraglamorous lifestyle was the envy of many.
meanings.sent5: The ultraglamorous yacht sailed gracefully on the water.

meanings.definition: To make something or someone appear more glamorous or stylish.
meanings.sent1: She used makeup to ultraglamorous her look for the event.
meanings.sent2: The stylist worked to ultraglamorous the celebrity's outfit.
meanings.sent3: He tried to ultraglamorous his car by adding shiny rims.
meanings.sent4: The makeover show aimed to ultraglamorous the participants.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer knew how to ultraglamorous any outfit.
